Container.Name: mbpfan
Container.Overview:
Containerized mbpfan (for Macs running Linux, to control fans)
NOTE: the executable in the container was compiled by bplein from https://github.com/linux-on-mac/mbpfan. Uses the Ubuntu repository version of https://github.com/linux-on-mac/mbpfan
Need to create a configuration file with the following contents and mount it in the container as a volume in the container under /etc/mbpfan.conf:
File contents of /mnt/user/appdata/mbpfan/mbpfan.conf (example on a Late 2012 i7 Mac mini) is available at: https://github.com/bplein/mbpfan/blob/master/etc/mbpfan.conf
Container.Requires: Must run as a privileged container.
